## Trie.match() method

Match a route path against the trie

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
match(path: string): (ResolvedNode<T> & {
        node: NodeWithValue<T>;
    }) | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> | The route path, such as <code>/customers/c01</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

`(ResolvedNode<T> & {
        node: NodeWithValue<T>;
    }) | undefined`
